lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Its action was designed to avoid having a Texas appeals court order it to post a security bond for the entire amount of the Pennzoil judgement.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Pennzoil said it knew of the SEC brief but it did not know whether the brief would support the view of one litigant or be an inquiry and request for clarification of the reasons for two lower state court decisions.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: If this friend of the court brief is potent and clearly pro-Texaco, and is taken into account by the Texas Supreme Court, there is a chance the entire judgment could be reversed and Pennzoil gets nothing," Leuffer said.
